name: Parasite (itch) (Shadoz, Em Baunton, Nerzero)
description:
A Parasite has attached upon you. There is now poison within you that needs a cure fast. Follow the clipboard on how to make the cure. Locations are randomly spawned each time so something might not be where it was last time.

Programming: (Shadoz / Josh)

3D Artists: (Scorpiius / Em),  (Nerzero / Kelvin)

Animation: (Nerzero /Kelvin)
